div.h1: Lamesa ISD will extend distance learning for all students through May 4th.

div.p: 4th graders read Frida Kahlo’s biography, answered compression questions. Then they followed a procedural text to create Frida’s self portrait. Great work TORS! 🖤🌪💛
It was an outdoor theme today in Mrs. Vasquez’s class! It was great to get out and get some sun while having some learning fun!
North TORS participate in distance PE! Keep it up. We are proud of you hard work.
Congratulations to Nayeli Vasquez on your well-deserved success! We are proud of you! #TorSeniors2020
